snippet.title: The Express Killer - Trailer E3 2018
snippet.description:
Detective Case and Clown is out NOW - http://goo.gl/t6wzjd

Steam page - http://store.steampowered.com/app/711920/
Humble Store - https://www.humblebundle.com/store/detective-case-and-clown-bot-in-the-express-killer
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/nerdmonkeys/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/caseandbot
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/caseandbot/

Someone has been killing passengers on the express train from Lisbon to Porto, every single day since Tuesday! Someone needs to stop the killer! Detective Case and Clown Bot to the rescue! Time to gather clues, solve puzzles, succeed trials, and find the culprit before the final station!

Trains, humor, mystery, horror, drama, and cod fish!
An adventure game for Windows, Mac and Linux.

Trailer music written & performed by Jochen Flach
Courtesy of K.P.M. Music Ltd.

Nerd Monkeys® 2018
